lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It's the economics that really make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students who need a second chance.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: everyone wants to provide for themselves, some  just need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the subject of agriculture to students from the ages of 13 to 18 years old.

lenders.name: Ellen Clark
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we who are so lucky must give back to the world.  Kiva gives us an easy way to to do that, and it makes me happy to be a part of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to design computer software, but due to my illness have not worked in a long time.

lenders.name: Liana
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people's dreams become reality.  I think it's amazing that I can make a difference in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going to school to become a teacher.

lenders.name: Judee
lenders.loan_because: My life is wonderful and I am grateful and would like to help others
lenders.occupational_info: Putting the Customer First

lenders.name: Ray & Michelle
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing to do!

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I can, I like to, and it makes sense to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my state government to protect the health and quality of our  state's forests which are owned by the state's citizens.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer my time to support President Obama's agenda.

lenders.name: Troy in California
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky!  Life is short and I believe in investing in worthy people.  Many people just do not have the money to build with. I feel good when I can help people improve their quality of life and be able to feed their families and loved ones.

lenders.name: Richard & Carole
lenders.loan_because: We think it's a duty to help

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: I received loans to go to college and I want to help make a difference in many lives.
lenders.occupational_info: medical doctor

lenders.name: Familia Graham
lenders.loan_because: every journey begins with a single $25 lent in syndicate

lenders.name: Fiona
lenders.loan_because: I have been extremely fortunate in getting a great education which allowed me to be working in my dream job. I want to help others fullfill their dreams, and I deeply respect how hard people are working to support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and develop extremely cool computer software!

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I am so impressed with the people who are starting new businesses and the dignity that this program brings to their efforts

lenders.name: kathy
lenders.loan_because: There but for the grace of goddess.....

lenders.name: KC & Cheryn
lenders.loan_because: we want to help others make a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: KC works for the railroad transporting consumer freight and Cheryn works in government in the clerical field.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: it makes other people feel good and it makes me feel good and it's the right thing to do. We are all in this together.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: what goes around, comes around!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach middle school students in grades 6th - 8th (11 - 14 years old).

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: A little of what I have can help others provide for themselves and their community.  We live in a global village.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college classes via the internet.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I love spreading love.
lenders.occupational_info: I help families with the decision of organ and tissue donation when they've lost a loved one.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I want to support other entrepreneurs in their endeavors.

lenders.name: Ronni
lenders.loan_because: I found this website by coincident. I think it’s a very good project and therefore I want to support it.
lenders.occupational_info: Bachelor in Social Education degree. Working in a kindergarten.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: No matter where you are in your life, you deserve to know there are people out there that want to help, believe and be there for each other to bring a little happiness to another’s life....

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate that I now have the funds to allow me to participate in Kiva and help others....and I love what this program can do to improve the life of others

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I believe hard working people should be given the opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Aaron, Yosmar & Stella
lenders.loan_because: The opportunity for our family to grow with the global community, learning from others, and improving our lives.
lenders.occupational_info: As parents to Stella our work is to provide her with a safe, nurturing environment.  My work in nursing is to deliver high technology medicine with a human touch.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: Because it is important to lend a hand and give support.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with my husband in his businesss

lenders.name: Olle
lenders.loan_because: It's the humane thing to do.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: we should accept help when we need it and give help when we can.

lenders.name: "Coop"
lenders.loan_because: We can create the world we dream about lending through KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: Assisting my fellow human beings without humbling them or causing them to become dependent.  Special emphasis on young families.

lenders.name: melody
lenders.loan_because: I have three beautiful children who are happy and well fed and who are in school.  Every parent should feel as happy as me.  I am blessed to have a chance to help another person  help themselves and their families!

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate and this is a great way to help others.  It encourages people that work hard and helps them and their families to get ahead.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell computers to businesses over the phone.  I'm in Sales.

lenders.name: jcsaidso
lenders.loan_because: Jesus Christ said so
lenders.occupational_info: fulfilling

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: gifts tend to be less effective.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: because I am so blessed that I could...
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small family owned hotel (not my family!)- only 19 rooms- I take reservations, manage costs, schedule housekeeping and maintenance jobs and hours and try to be a good witness for Christ in the process.

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.loan_because: I can; and everybody deserves a chance
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a practice within a global consulting company

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: Because helping other people become self sufficient by their own work is more useful than giving handouts
lenders.occupational_info: I help people account for the money they spend and receive in their business

lenders.name: L.J.
lenders.loan_because: Someone helped me when I needed it and now it's time to give back.

lenders.name: jenn
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Sheilah
lenders.loan_because: God blesses me every day,  and I want to pass it on to other women.
lenders.occupational_info: For many years I worked in an office.  Now I "work" by occasionally helping a woman in childbirth.  I also volunteer as an  animal rescuer.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves. I feel fortunate to live where I live and have access to resources.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with people. I work as a clinician in my own business. I also work in a clinic that is not for profit. I also work as an educator.
I am also involved in a local coffee shop where I put my other business hat on.

lenders.name: Melissa and Chris
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a giant difference.

lenders.name: Coralie and Denny
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of owning and growing your own business.  I am happy to be able to help other people realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped by so many people in my life. This is one way to return the help.
lenders.occupational_info: I restore older homes and build new homes for people.

lenders.name: Outdoor Talk - Members
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help other people, and who better to offer help than somoone who is at least putting forth a little extra effort.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of outdoor enthusiasts who enjoy talking over the internet about various topics, usually outdoor sports and activities such as hiking, fishing, and hunting among numerous other outdoor prusuits.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: we can all make a difference.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student and research assistant in an oceanography laboratory in Alaska.  I am studying the natural variability of dissolved nutrients in the Gulf of Alaska ecosystem.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the best ways I've found to help.. through KIVA.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Roberta
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the individuals requesting loans and their stories. They show determination, creativity, and initiative in meeting their day to day needs for themselves and their families. How wonderful to be involved in these projrcts!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Hospice program. We take care of very sick people of all ages who are dying from their illness. We support their families after their death to help them cope with the death and find new meaning in their lives.

lenders.name: Darrell
lenders.loan_because: I love to see business grow and I think it is awesome to help other people. This seems to be such an incredible cause to help the world economy.
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher/coach/real estate investor

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a catalyst for change and I believe in helping those who help themselves.

lenders.name: Ida
lenders.loan_because: I believe that hard-working people need a chance to make money.  Kiva gives many entrepreneurs the opportunity to build a business and help create a sustainable economy for their countries. Microloans are an important way to share our good fortune as citizens of the world.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: it's such an easy way to help others realize their dream.  There's no reason not to do it!
lenders.occupational_info: I help record and organize the financial records of a coffee company.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: to help others reach their goals
lenders.occupational_info: stressful and fun, all at the same time.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs that chance to make their life better.  I believe all children should have the right to education, they do not choose their own circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes, one of the most important transactions of their lives!

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hardworking people around the world.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse, traveling in rural areas to patients' homes to assist them with their medical conditions.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I feel good about doing something to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: we all have the power to make a difference in this world...
lenders.occupational_info: I am very popular amongst friends and family. I make French pastries and all different kinds of desserts and sweets and love doing it.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone deserves to live a good life.  Living in the USA I have many opportunities available to me.  I want others to be able to have the opportunity to change their life and pursue their dream of running a successful business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who are abused or neglected by their parents or guardians.  I provide the children and their parents or guardians with referrals to services needed in order for the family to remain together or to be reunited.

lenders.name: Bob Beckett & Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to directly assist people who want to establish and grow their own business.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
The entrepreneurs on Kiva can really use any help they can get to start going. They are not begging, but instead try and work hard to build up something good for themselves and others around them. I really admire this.

Kiva is truly a great initiative and I am happy to participate!
lenders.occupational_info: I make computer systems work.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: To make the world a better place

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I know that it is difficult to start and run your own business.  9 years ago I started my own business in a male dominated industry and it is successful.  I have put in a lot of hard work and dedication and I couldn't have done it without the support of my husband and family.  I want to give others an opportunity to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: Home remodeling and decorating.

lenders.name: Vickie
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: Secretary to people needing government assistance.

lenders.name: Tonya
lenders.loan_because: "Everyone" is important.
lenders.occupational_info: Mother of two. Full time college student. Miltary spouse.

lenders.name: Russ Schoen
lenders.loan_because: I find it is rewarding to provide resources that may help people improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: helping teams go from "blamestorming to brainstorming". Innovation training and facilitation. Training people to see and create new possibilities. University Instructor at the International Center for Studies in Creativity.  www.buffalostate.edu/creativity

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: the Lord has blessed me, and I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the president of an engineering company.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: i would like to help others get a start  so they can live their dream
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and help people in the area that I live.  I also volunteer in  ministry  to tell people about Jesus.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: This is such a great way to lend a hand up to someone in need, and the results they achieve with such modest amounts is truly remarkable.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to be able to provide for my family and want to help others develop their businesses so that they can provide a better life for their families.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to practice generosity
lenders.occupational_info: I bring joy, inspiration, courage, spiritual and financial success to thousands and thousands of people

lenders.name: Helene
lenders.loan_because: I had to start over late in life and it was tough.  Now it is possible, in  this way, to extend a hand to others who are  having a rough go of it -especially where help and resources  are limited. I love Kiva  - it makes helping out very satisfying.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small music business and also play the cello.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I can. The micro economy is so important in developing countries, especially Central and South America. Buena Suerte con su empresa!
lenders.occupational_info: Help educators integrate technology into teaching and learning, as well as other aspects of using technology in education.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I support the idea of people pooling their money to help others via small loans as demonstrated by the Credit Unions around the world.    This is a very dynamic application of this concept and everyone benefits.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a Director of a local Credit Union for over 20 years and I believe in the 'helping hand' approach of making small loans to help others improve their lives.

lenders.name: Elise
lenders.loan_because: I really want to change people's lives!

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much and I would like to give others the opportunity to be self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am responsible for hiring the staff
that take care of our patients in one the one the best hospitals in the world-
UCLA (University of California Los Angeles)

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: Always been aware of the imbalance MY typical American lifestyle causes those less fortunate across the globe, but "Confessions of an Economic Hit Man" really opened my eyes.  Kiva allows me some ability to make a small difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Among other things I build sets and scenery for theaters, opera, musical, dance and other performing arts events.

lenders.name: ML Brittany John
lenders.loan_because: Our family helps girls and women around the world start and grow their own businesses so that they can better support and educate their families.
lenders.occupational_info:
Mary Lynn helps the leaders of companies run their businesses better.

Brittany is in 9th grade.

John is a banker.

lenders.name: zakk, terri, josh, yo
lenders.loan_because:
we're a family with four different businesses that we are running.
we know that helping each other out matters.
lenders.occupational_info: terri has a healing art business, josh is a musician, yo and zakk run a computer graphics/tutorial business.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women have their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a pharmaceutical company that is developing new medicines for specific diseases.

lenders.name: Arne Vagn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference and teach my daughter the gift of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I am director of a radiology department in a local hospital.

lenders.name: Ken, Vicky, Gabby, Emily
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us with abundance so that we may be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in service to my community by caring for the sick, the injured, and the displaced through medical care and preservation of property and assets.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are trying to help themselves.  Loans give people dignity and teach them responsibility.  Go Kiva!

lenders.name: Jorge
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people that are prepared to take initiative.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: As an artist and a small business owner, it feels good to know I can make a difference in the lives of other entrepreneurs working hard to follow their dreams.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I recently visited Nepal and realized more than ever how much our loans can do to help people in need.

lenders.name: Humphrey & Mary
lenders.loan_because:
I have travelled the hard road and life has been good to me.
I'm greatful to Kiva for giving me this opportunity to enpower others to attain a better life for themselves and their children

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help people all over the world achieve their dreams of better lives.  I especially like knowing exactly who will benefit from my loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children ages 8 - 11, and in my spare time I make quilts to keep people warm at night.  I also volunteer with AFS Intercultrual Programs, bringing teenagers from all over the world to the USA to live with families and go to high school for one year.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate in my life and want to share with others
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office during the day and recharge my spirit outdoors in the evenings and weekends.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: My mother always taught me that the blessings you give out to others will come back to you.  My life is so blessed and I am so grateful to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in my second career (after teaching 30 years) as an attorney specializing in helping disabled people get Social Security disability benefits.

lenders.name: Jane & Bob
lenders.loan_because: I have had a helping hand in my life and feel it is time to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info:
We take care of our grandchildren.
Work on our cars and take care of our home.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I believe anyone willing to work should get a chance to succeed in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mom - that's the same no matter where you are!

lenders.name: Cisneros Family
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple, yet powerful way in which our family can make a difference :)

lenders.name: craig
lenders.occupational_info: auto repair

lenders.name: Ricardo
lenders.loan_because: As an American-Colombian entrepreneur, I identify not only with entrepreneurs around the globe and with the responsibility to help the latino community but also with the idea that a great microlending program is one of the most efficient ways to promote economic development around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I started a tech support company 5 years ago. We support all the computer equipment of 200 businesses in NY.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We need to make a difference where we can.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people value what they pay for and small loans given at reasonable rates encourage entrepreneurship and self reliance.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the business affairs of a small non-profit community owned ski area in New Mexico

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone is entitled to make their own way in the world and sometimes they may need a little help - I and other Kiva lenders are that little help that people need.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I just can't think of a reason to not loan.  I am lucky that my husband and I can afford a home and have jobs that support us and our daughter.  We are both in public service and don't have a large amount of expendable income but we can help and will teach our daughter to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in public transportation in Upstate New York.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of people and with a hand up, people can thrive and care for their family.  Thanks, Kiva for making this so easy.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone  provide for them self and their family.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I dont have much, but others have given a helping hand at times when I have truly had need.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired police officer, who works with small movies doing police advice, And as an ordained minister do weddings...

lenders.name: barbara and ken
lenders.loan_because: We love seeing people start their own businesses and become successful.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: I heard about KIVA on NPR and deeply appreciate its global reach and spirit. It's a true miracle that someone like me can contribute with such ease to the truly needy and wonderful people who receive these loans and touch so many lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelancer doing crafts and home design projects for magazines.

lenders.name: Amena
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of something that benefits other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker

lenders.name: Shirley & Doug
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I are touched daily reading about those around us near and far away that live in difficult times.  We wish for peace in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Shirley is a retired Office Manager and Doug is a self published writer.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: There was a time many many years ago when I was newly divorced and really struggling financially.  Someone anonymously left me several sacks of groceries when I really needed it.  There was a note that said someone had helped this person once, and asked that whenever I had opportunity in my life to help others, would I?  I help now because though I'm not rich, I have more than my basic needs met, and I want  to share where I can so that others can have their needs met.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a successful real estate management company in their Information Technology department.

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.loan_because: it makes the world a better place.

lenders.name: Deanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a part of someone's dream
lenders.occupational_info: I negotiate and manage business

lenders.name: John and Renee
lenders.loan_because: Loans to help people help themselves, and teach them about managing money to provide a better life for their families - a simple but so effective solution at such a small cost.  It makes sense to us.

lenders.name: ralph
lenders.loan_because: I believe in encouraging entrepreneurship, and allowing fair opportunities for everyone. Someone helped me get started once, and I want to give that back!
lenders.occupational_info: I manufacture and distribute sports wear

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: One day I might need help and its nice to know we still live in a world where people still care about the little guy.   We may be the only hope some of these people have and they deserve a chance. It is our duty to give back to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the county school board, in the district office print shop

lenders.name: keith
lenders.loan_because: why not
lenders.occupational_info: Install telephones and computers.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and want to help others.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: It's the most powerful use of my money I've found.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist start-up and existing small businesses in creating and implementing strategy.

lenders.name: Pablo
lenders.loan_because: My friend Christina drug me into it.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: Restructuring your life for the better is not something unfamiliar to me... it takes strength, dedication & belief in yourself to move forward. I have no hesitation in helping these motivated people start their journeys & see their goals accomplished.
lenders.occupational_info: laid off 3 yrs ago with few employment opportunities to use my 30+ yrs of professional experience & skills due to the current U.S. economy

lenders.name: Sydney
lenders.loan_because: I have been in the position where a small amount of money would have been tremendously helpful to me, and it is good to be able to loan to others now.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional oil painter.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home with my kids and my dogs. I try to create the best environment for their well being.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: Because anyone who can, should. Not to mention it feels good.   :)
lenders.occupational_info: I co-own a business that designs custom web technologies.

lenders.name: mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to cotinue helping others to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I worked as a nursing sister in a very busy outpatients dept in a glasgow hospital

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: Feels good to do a good deed. No matter how small.

lenders.name: juan carlos
lenders.loan_because: Iam a student and i want to open my own company in tourism
lenders.occupational_info: I want to work to myself becase i am studing tourism in Cusco Peru and the owner of the companies here pay few for too much work for that i want my own company.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I believe in encouraging hard working individuals to pursue their dreams and to provide for their families. Kiva seems to be a good organization!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm semi retired and now able  to pursue my dream to be a  nature photographer. I work hard to improve my skills and enjoy the process very much. I have some of my work at a local gallery, and show on my website.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I started my business with a very small investment and I want to encourage anyone who has the courage to start his own enterprise.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs for small businesses, many of which are just getting started.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who are motivated to help themselves.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I understand how a small amount can make a big difference in people's lives.

lenders.name: Vyonne
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to believe that I could help someone change their life in a positive way because I have been helped by others before.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my patients maintain a healthy mouth by cleaning their teeth and removing germs that could harm all of their body.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: As a single mom, I understand how hard it is for women in this world to get ahead and make something of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I rent and sell construction equipment.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: "If a man shuts his ears to the cry of the poor, he too will cry out and not be answered."  Prov 21:13.  I believe microloans work, and I want to be a part of giving someone a helping hand.

lenders.name: The Icelander
lenders.loan_because: Those persons having courage to ask for help to make there lives better should be given chance

lenders.name: Annabelle and Dave
lenders.occupation: we work in the arts and in internet video editing

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I wish I had my own business, yet it's great to be a tiny part in helping a sister far away succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am unemployed but I wish could do more to help children have a chance in life and succeed.

lenders.name: Danna
lenders.occupation: Director of Program Management for a CME company
lenders.loan_because: I am first generation "American", so the stuggles of making it in some of these countries is a not too distant part of my heritage.

lenders.name: Kaya and Katy
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people achieve their dreams and we want to show them that we love them.
lenders.occupational_info: Kaya is an attorney; and Katy is in 1st Grade.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.  I do not make a lot of money, BUT I know I will spend $25.00 on extras for myself or my husband.  so  that $25.00 is going to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical secretary in Labor and Delivery at a local Hospital.  I process Birth certificates, do newborn hearing tests.

lenders.name: Billy
lenders.loan_because: I'm passionate about helping entrepreneurs succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Grammy & Emmy nominated, CMA award winning songwriter, Team Building facilitator & Keynote speaker,

lenders.name: The Sullivan Family
lenders.loan_because: I think it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.loan_because: “Many small people, in many small places, do many small things, that can alter the face of the world.” ~Anonymous -
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Sr. Account Manager in the Healthcare IT Consulting industry, matching Hospitals with Consultants to meet their IT project needs.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Studying to be a lawyer.

lenders.name: LCG
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people being able to take responsibility for their own life, and have a chance to make their own living.

lenders.name: Neal
lenders.loan_because: I've been very fortunate. Although I do not have much money by every-day USA standards, my income is quite sufficient for me to live on and enjoy some extra things. I've been sharing much of my life activities with others for many years, and I find that this is a wonderful way to make some of my money do some real good. At my age (77) it's sometimes hard to find activities that one can trust completely. I do trust Kiva, and I hope that Maria soon has enough to fulfill her needs.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare income tax returns. The income tax law in the U.S. is quite complicated and professionals like myself help others to prepare their tax documents so that they are correct and pay only those taxes that they are required to pay. I also assist people in investing their money.

lenders.name: Logan & Rachel
lenders.loan_because: Being teachers we love giving to others.  Giving both the gift of knowledge or others the ability to follow their dream  is what we live and breath each day.  We just want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both public school educators.  My wife teaches high school math and I teach elementary art.

lenders.name: Felicia
lenders.loan_because: $25 makes very little impact on our day to day lives, but if it empowers someone in another part of the world not as privileged as ours, it's the least we can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide IV therapy to patients in their homes.

lenders.name: Zane
lenders.loan_because: to perpetuate capitalism for those who are less fortunate

lenders.name: Brian, Maritza & kids
lenders.loan_because: it makes such great practical sense to assist the entrepreneur in building a means of  living that will (+) impact both their family and greater community.  A very small price to contribute greatly across the world.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: what a wonderful opportunity to change someone's life for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the sales and marketing of consumer wireless products in 165 stores.

lenders.name: Craig Muller
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in this simple and powerful way is right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach middle and high school math and science..

lenders.name: William Ty
lenders.loan_because: I did well in the "womb lottery" and was born in this day and age in the U.S....which, yes means I didn't do so well in many fronts, but I was afforded a certain means to education and to income.  I wish to share in my "winnings."
lenders.occupational_info:
Trabajo en un restarante de pescados y mariscos.  El restarante donde trabajo es muy caro.  El trabajo que hago es como cantinero, pero yo abro ostiones y conchas para mis clientes.  Posiblemente, la cosa que es estrano para gente en otro paises es que los clientes comen los mariscos crudos...de veras!  Es muy rico.
Trabajo para una duena simpatica, pero no gana mucho de horario, solamente gana la mayoria de mi plata de propinas.

lenders.name: James Elmer
lenders.loan_because:
I am not wealthy but I have been very blessed. Kiva makes it possible for me to share those blessings and make a difference in someone's life where it would otherwise be very difficult for me to do so. 
My thanks and appreciation to all of you and all you do at Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: For over 33 years I have designed and executed custom embroidery on Theatrical, Circus & Ballet costumes; Rock & Opera stars; draperies, table covers & pillows for Interior Designers; and Collectibles (like my exclusive line of solid sequin Teddy Bears).

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are willing to work hard to help themselves.  I love the concept of social lending and crowd funding to help people achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women feel beautiful and confident by helping them learn to style their lives.  I also coach women on opening their own successful businesses so they can enjoy a fun and flexible lifestyle.

lenders.name: Jamie Ratliff
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people who are trying to start or run a business deserve a chance to be successful.  I am honored to be able to help others start or expand their business. Since the US dollar goes a lot further in other parts of the world, it makes it very inexpensive to help others. After all, who cant afford to lend $25 to give someone a chance to make a dramatic change in their life?
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer specializing in small business, internet, and search engine optimization.

lenders.name: Nita
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with an amazing loving support system. It is my obligation and joy to pass on support to others
lenders.occupational_info: I take photographs and manipulate their texture

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I will help you and you will help someone in need in the future - and so on - as we come to understand that we are ultimately one big community.
lenders.occupational_info: I recently retired after working more then 25 years for the protection of the environment.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.occupational_info: I work as both a wildlife and nature photographer and a scientist. Some of my photos can be seen at    ...

lenders.name: Steve and Myra
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed and we would like a chance to share with others.

lenders.name: Cece
lenders.loan_because: I'm an American....I have so much.  Kiva gives me a chance to share, and make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I'm working on being the best person I can be.

lenders.name: Maura
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are trying so hard to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in two businesses.  I am an esthetician and massage therapist with one business and a Strategic Analyst with the other.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children with mental disabilities.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: This organization is making a difference in supporting entrepreneurs in the developing world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach university courses in psychology, artificial intelligence, marketing, and what it is like to participate in war.  I'm very fortunate in that I basically teach what I'm interested in.  I also run a publishing business (books of interest for people over age 60).

lenders.name: Sungho
lenders.loan_because: I would like to do something that I can help people improve their business and life. I also want to be a lender.
lenders.occupational_info: The most of my work is to create my software architecture designs and patterns. have a fun and relax ..

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.occupation: Care Coordinator with Adolescents and their famili

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I am a mother and grandmother.  I think women should help other women.  I think it is important for us to be aware of what is happening in our world and to try to make a contribution.
lenders.occupational_info: I had my own business for 20 years.  I retired in July, 2006, and I now try to spend as much time as possible with my husband, grandchildren and children.

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: I care!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I own a women's clothing boutique

lenders.name: Kodi
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe in Karma ( my Dogma ain't half bad either! ). This enables me to practice small "p" philanthropy. I also want the Kiva person to know that there are people in the World that care.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in Hospitals providing therapy that a human cannot provide. I have seen incredible results in the people I have worked with. Kiva provides a means for me to help change a person's life from a distance.

lenders.name: Shandra
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves through running their own business.  I also think this type of support is most helpful to women living in poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a substitute teacher that primarily works with elementary students.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am employed in the IT department of a grocery retail company.

lenders.name: Mike & Mary Jo
lenders.loan_because: A man filled with the love of God, is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race.
lenders.occupational_info: I loan to help facilitate principals of self-reliance; to care for ourselves and our families and to find solutions for our own problems.

lenders.name: Federico Sosa Otero
lenders.loan_because:
I am a young Paraguayan professional who wants to help other Paraguayans who lack access to credit. I believe micro finance is an essential tool in alleviating poverty because it provides individuals the opportunity to help themselves, through their own effort,  rather than through handouts by the state or charity, which are all too common here in Paraguay.

I hope to help through my small contributions and by encouraging other Paraguayans to contribute to Kiva.

lenders.name: Christian Finance
lenders.loan_because: I care and because that's what Jesus would do.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I'm just trying to help

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I have enough to share with others.

lenders.name: Dale and Jill
lenders.loan_because: We know that we are blessed beyond what we need and it's a priviledge to serve others.
lenders.occupational_info: Coffee Distribution business - profits from this business are invested in microenterprise loans.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: We are all on this planet together and I feel we need to help each other as often as we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I mostly make a living as a scenic artist and designer for live theatre.

lenders.name: C.J.
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to spare $25 that could help someone else in a great way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in Sales and Management and would love to some day return to the Philippines where I once lived, and make it a better place for those who struggle.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage online classes

lenders.name: Shafeen
lenders.loan_because: There are different ways to help people.  In some parts of the world basic necessities such as food, water and shelter are required.  In other parts of the world, it may be something else.  The reason I like the microloan model is because it helps folks become self sustainable. "Give a man a fish, feed him for a day ... teach a man to fish, feed him for a lifetime."

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: It is a way for me to be a part of my global community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently at the University of Minnesota studying Social Justice and Biology.

lenders.name: Gary & Brenda
lenders.loan_because: We've been very fortunate and received help from others when we needed it.
lenders.occupational_info: He helps build aeroplanes. She sells houses.

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: With the combined efforts through Kiva we all help make this world a much better place.

lenders.name: Daniel Kauffman
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe that microfinancing works wonders to eliminate poverty and help struggling economies. I like to provide the opportunity for those less fortunate to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: 2013 MBA candidate at William and Mary

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an equal chance to succeed in life

lenders.name: Cindee
lenders.loan_because: I care about mother Gaia and the lives she sustains...

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to assist others in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: During the day I work for a great company called Proncon MRM Pacific and on the weekends am a civil marriage celebrant in Melbourne who also performs vow renewals, love commitments, house warming, name giving and other ceremonies.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to grow up in a better world for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info:
George Harris is a public policy advocate focused upon community and economic development and international investment.


http://georgeharris.brandyourself.com/

lenders.name: JC Sunglao
lenders.loan_because: I was looking for a mini fridge to buy and thought this was a better use of my money.
lenders.occupational_info: Student in College

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.whereabouts: Ho Chi Minh Ho Chi Minh

lenders.name: Tomas
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be able to give a helping hand without having a lot of money.

lenders.name: SpeedyMax
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back something
lenders.occupational_info: Information Technology System Engineer

lenders.name: Luqman Skye
lenders.occupational_info: computational biology

lenders.name: CIGALE
lenders.loan_because: What a wonderful way to help other women make their dreams come true!

lenders.name: Alexa
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people working together around the world can create miracles of which government bureaucracies can only dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the tax and finance department of a multinational manufacturing company.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Raising students critical awareness of their own subjectivity as well as their relationship to wider society.

lenders.name: Camilla
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying library and information science in Copenhagen, Denmark

lenders.name: Damian
lenders.loan_because: There can only be peace when the basic needs are taken care of.  Even though I don't have much there is always enough here in the USA where we can afford to share without manipulating goverments.  Peace be for all.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently disabled and am getting social security.  I am also investigating means of a bussiness which I can earn a living within the parameters of my temporary disabilities.  I choose to look at my health situation as tempory for I believe in miracles.  I know I am one already.  Peace.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should be given a chance to make something out of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in retail for many years and just recently retired to enjoy life to it's fullest.  I have been very lucky in life and it gives me great pleasure to help others.

lenders.name: kotinka
lenders.loan_because: I've always been lucky enough to have help when I needed it.  I hope others can have that too.
lenders.occupational_info: bl00dy exhausting! being a mum is the hardest job going & the least recognised.  The photo is my youngest son, Michael, covered in muck & wearing his grandad's shoes - so cute!

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the hard work of others in dire need of funds to simply run their business to feed their families
lenders.occupational_info: I sell homes

lenders.name: Betsey
lenders.loan_because: I am truly fortunate in my life, and would like to help others have opportunities and better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I  teach Health and Physical Fitness to college students.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I am helping someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Enjoying life and trying to give a little back =)

lenders.name: Stefanie
lenders.loan_because: It important to give back.

lenders.name: Araceli
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a "push-up" vs. a "hand-out".  Those requesting loans are trying to help themselves and their families by WORKING.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.occupation: Glass bead maker and world gadfly
lenders.loan_because: I like to share my good fortune, make the world a safer place, see smiles smitten
lenders.occupational_info: When I'm not making glass bead jewelry, I'm working to promote interfaith dialogue.  I think that can make the world a more peaceful place.

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: God has been so kind to me and my family and I want to help someone else in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a furniture store in a small town in the midwest  . we sell all types of home furnishings .

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are not as fortunate to have the opportunities that we have here in the USA. I think if we give a little no matter how small, It will one day make a difference and help make it a better world to live in. And maybe some day unite and have world peace.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I desperately need to build an addition to my house for my three children.  Please help.
lenders.occupational_info: mom

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to touch people all around the world and to have a positive impact in someone's life.  It is a true privilege for me to assist someone who has the desire and passion to work hard to better their own life.
lenders.occupational_info: Management training and development.

lenders.name: Kelli Pedersen
lenders.loan_because: it's a small amount (dinner out for our family) but can completely change another persons life.  Also, it is such a lift when someone pays off their loan and you know they were able to reach their goal!
lenders.occupational_info: I cut and design vinyl lettering and sayings for walls, window decals and banners. I am also trying to start  "Kelz Hot Dogz" where I will work lunch hours, tournaments and festivals.

lenders.name: Vladik
lenders.loan_because: its necessary.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a small difference in the world.

lenders.name: Tamica
lenders.loan_because: The Lord blesses me continually so it is my desire to be a blessing to someone else.

lenders.name: Antoinette
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people.

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people.  I do not have much money, but I like to help others who are worse off than I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer and handle telephone calls from customers who are having problems with their telephone service.

lenders.name: Maryellen
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help other women so they inturn can help themselves and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my two children.  my husband has a job outside the home.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference even if it is a small one which can help one more person.  I want to pass it on!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student going for my elementary education degree so that I can teach young children.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.occupation: former Biotech Co National Sales Mgr
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate enough to be educated and able to contribute to the support of my family, communities, and country.  This is a way to give back worldwide and help other people who are trying to achieve the same goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I was responsible for the sale of  hospital and medical research supplies to scientists in the US who were doing research on the human body and trying to discover new drugs and treatments for patients.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I can identify with the people requesting loans.  I don't have much money to give away and I really like the loan idea.  Helping people help themselves is a great way to do my part in my own small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't have a job at the moment.  I'm taking a writing course and spend much of my time training my dogs (I have 8 of them!)  My husband is a carpenter and is very active in his Alcoholics Anonymous group.

lenders.name: Carol M.
lenders.loan_because:
All people deserve an opportunity to make an honest living and should be rewarded for their hard work. 
Eccl 4:9,10

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I dont have much money myself, and I know what it is like to work hard.    I am currently a student, a single mom and I also work part time.  I am now having my third child and was recently diagnosed with a terminal heart condition.  When you give to others, it always is given back to you, maybe not in the same form, it might just be in happiness, however, you have nothing in live of any value if you do not have love and happiness.

lenders.name: www.creditfast.com
lenders.loan_because: With the help of Kiva, our goal is to help people live their dreams and provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Credit Fast is a credit card application website. Join our Kiva team, Team CreditFast.com and help deserving people all over the world get credit. http://www.kiva.org/community/viewTeam?team_id=2275

lenders.name: Lenita
lenders.loan_because: It is very fulfilling to help pull someone from poverty, see someone's dream come true, and to also know that my loan helped make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Maliwan
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I feel it is very important to give back and to help those in need. I know how important it is for someone to believe in you and what a difference that can make in a person’s life. Each small business loan given out by kiva.org is a piece of hope and relief for the recipient - a chance for them to know they have a support system that wants them to succeed whether it be from across an ocean or right next door. Having the opportunity to give is one of the best gifts in the world.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I have visited Africa twice to help build a school for AIDS orphans - I have seen first hand what each persons donation large or small  can do to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom to 3 boys - 23, 21, and 18. I believe that you teach a child by example. I want them to know the importance of giving back.

lenders.name: Jillian
lenders.loan_because: People need to be able to help themselves.  The world makes it difficult.  I understand the cost of starting a business, and the work involved.  I especially feel for anyone trying to do this as well as raise a family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom of 2, and sort of run a soap making business.  I make soap and lotion in my home.

lenders.name: ANN
lenders.occupational_info: RN

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.occupation: loves eating at restaurants with homemade foods

lenders.name: jesse and silvia
lenders.loan_because: "You must be the change that you want to see in the world"

lenders.name: Irena Rūta
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info: When people need to talk but cannot communicate due to the language barrier, I serve as a faithful echo and make the conversation happen.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: Like those I am lending to, I am also an entrepreneur working to support a family. My children are healthy and well-cared for, and I want to share the wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to exercise properly and safely, both to improve athletic performance, and to improve overall health and fitness.

lenders.name: Ozlem
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life who is trying to improve their quality of life. I feel blessed to have all that I have in my life and I want to give back to those who are less fortunate than myself. I liked the idea of Kiva since it enables entrepreuners to take the loan to expand their business without the money being used solely as charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large company in the information technology department. Basically, I manage the applications that support our marketing organization.

lenders.name: Marty and Bill
lenders.loan_because: in the words of George Eliot, "What do we live for if not to make life less difficult for each other?"

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: God wants us to help each other.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone who is willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain  high pressure boilers and the operation of sky scrapper type buildings in Chicago.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: If we are fortunate in this life and this world, we have an obligation to support others as we are able.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct psychological risk evaluations on students who have safe school violations. For example, weapons at school or drug use.

lenders.name: PAUL KOBINA
lenders.loan_because: how do i apply for a loan?
lenders.occupational_info: care for orphanage,street children disables etc

lenders.name: Rosa
lenders.loan_because: I would like each dollar I loan to stretch and help more people help themselves.

lenders.name: Marisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people who has faith that they can do it, because I am also business women.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is taking care of the customer by doing their clothes I am in dry cleans business.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: After having been afforded the opportunity to experience the generosity and goodwill of honest people around the world, I would like to return their gestures of kindness.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a helicopter pilot.

lenders.name: brenda
lenders.loan_because: GOD HAS TRULY BLESSED ME AND I GIVE FROM MY HEART.
lenders.occupational_info: CUSTOMER SERVICE AND I LOVE PEOPLE .  I TRIED TO MAKE ALL CLIENTS TO THE SPA FEEL GOOD, COMFORTABLE AND RELAXED AND ENSURE THEY ENJOY THEIR SERVICES.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.whereabouts: newcastle upon tyne Tyne and Wear
lenders.loan_because: i feel that everyone deserves a chance too help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: i work on an oil rig in the north sea

lenders.name: Stefanie
lenders.loan_because: I travel the world constantly being a travel expert and journalist. I find in many occasions, that I want to do more to help the locals, than just with my writings about their locations, and often find I am limited by my own resources. Kiva gives me the oppertunity to reach out and share in my life's good fortune,  by lending a hand to people with adventurous entrepreneurial spirits.
lenders.occupational_info: I am known as Adventure Girl. I am a travel expert who writes about travel and adventure stories for magazines and talk about travel on television shows in America.

lenders.name: B A
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of my money can make a huge impact on someone else's life.

lenders.name: Johnny
lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels to need a little money to build confidence and get ahead.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I am a senior in college studying business. I hope to own my own business one day, and would like to help others fulfill their dream.

lenders.name: Analiza
lenders.loan_because: i need a money in my online business as affiliiate marketer and seller  of women accessories like bags, I have 5 kids and i want to help my husband
lenders.occupational_info: im selling womens accessories online and a partime affilliate marketer in the internet.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the micro loan concept. Supporting small businesses improves all aspects of the community.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small businesses that are in trouble. Their lenders bring me in so they can improve their profits and keep paying back the loans.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone needs a little help from time to time.

lenders.name: william
lenders.loan_because: because the borrowers have shown they deserve it by they actions of work ethics, repayment and need
lenders.occupational_info: I sold Insurance to Business & Individual & made myself available to them daily for advise & coverage

lenders.name: DIANE,ROB,MATT,JORDAN
lenders.loan_because: To be able to give is the greatest gift, and my children are learning to share hope and dreams

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I beleive we are put on this planet to help one another. Also, I feel particularly connected to women and children around the world, and want to provide support in any way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with "at-risk" high school aged kids. I aim to support and empower them to improve their lives and achieve happiness and stability.

lenders.name: Joseph Taggart
lenders.loan_because: I've been helped through rough times - now I want to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I study law and public administration at the University of Utah

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a small difference in the world. My funds are limited, but if I can make a difference with $25 dollars, then I will do it!
lenders.occupational_info: I help customers obtain mortgage loans to purchase their homes.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I work for a not for profit that is building infrastructure in rural america for responsible animal producers that has been lost to consolidation and the take over by big AG.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people organize to protect their rights, homes and quality of life.

lenders.name: Minori
lenders.loan_because: it gives me so much joy to be able to give someone a chance to improve their business and hopefully their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working on a Master's degree in Comparative and International Education at Oxford.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I saw the segment of the Oprah Show and was curious.  I think this is a great website!!!  To not only "give" but to be in touch with the person and become friends with someone across the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle estates and trusts administration

lenders.name: Alaynelynn
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to live where I live.  To have a family who is near me and who loves me.  I have faith in humankind.
lenders.occupational_info: I obtain prices for big construction project in a City that has only older adults (seniors citizens ages 55 and older) 18,000 of them!

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed our family and I want to pass that on!
lenders.occupational_info: I take photos and make custom handmade notecards with them.

lenders.name: Francois
lenders.loan_because: Demonstrated efficiency
lenders.occupational_info: Help people change

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I often need help meeting my own bills and expenses, and many times other people have helped me out. I am delighted to be able to be on the giving end for a change.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist - which doesn't pay my bills, So I also have a job. The job is bathing dogs, and cleaning and doing whatever is necessary to help out at a dog grooming salon.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: The more self-sufficient you become, the more pride and confidence you'll have in yourself. You'll be a positive role model to others and future generations.
lenders.occupational_info: I design  and produce printed communications for a variety of businesses and industries.
